full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** ACAN 23-58052 High-Performance Tunable Laser System
**Official Title:** PAC 23-58052 – Système laser accordable haute performance

**Number:** cb-7810-90432425
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** August 2, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 17, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EDT
**Government Contracting Entity:** National Research Council Canada

**Solicitation Overview:**
The National Research Council Canada has a requirement for a high-performance tunable laser system with specific technical specifications to match an existing system in the AEP Photonics facility. The current laser is nearing the end of its lifespan, and replacement is necessary to maintain testing capacity and accommodate growing demand from internal research projects.

**Technical Requirements:**

* A tuning range of 1240-1380 nm
* A maximum sweep speed of 200 nm/s
* A peak output power of +13 dBm, with at least +5 dBm over the full range
* A linewidth below 10 kHz
* A signal-to-spare-spontaneous-emission ratio better than 80 dB/nm
* An absolute wavelength accuracy of ± 1.5 pm in continuous sweep mode
* A wavelength repeatability of ± 0.3 pm in continuous sweep mode

**Pre-Identified Supplier:** Keysight Technologies Canada Inc.

**Reasons for Limited Tendering:**

The Government has invoked exceptions under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Estimated Contract Value:** $158,000 CAD (GST/HST extra)

**Delivery Schedule:** The equipment must be delivered before March 29, 2024.

**Supplier Contact:** Katie Homuth, Senior Contracting Officer, at Katie.Homuth@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca or (343) 549-4539.

**Submission Instructions:**
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods described in the ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person on or before the closing date of this notice. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements. [Notice Attachment: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform
